sources.name: GetThesaurusTypes
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimID as integer,
		DimName as string,
		DimDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> GetThesaurusTypes

sources.name: GetTaxonomyTermTypes
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		TypeDescription as string,
		TypeAvailable as boolean,
		TypeSourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> GetTaxonomyTermTypes

sinks.name: InsertSink
sinks.script:
AssignForInsertion sink(input(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		Description = TypeDescription,
		Available = TypeAvailable,
		SourceID = DimSourceID
	)) ~> InsertSink

sinks.name: UpdateSink
sinks.script:
Filter1 sink(input(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		Description = TypeDescription
	),
	dateFormat:'dd/MM/yyyy') ~> UpdateSink

sinks.name: DeleteSink
sinks.script:
TermTypeSoftDelete sink(input(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		Description,
		Available = TypeAvailable,
		SourceID = TypeSourceID
	)) ~> DeleteSink

sinks.name: MarkTermsOfThisTypeAlsoUnavailable
sinks.script:
Filter2 sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TermName = TypeName,
		Description = TypeDescription,
		Available = TypeAvailable
	)) ~> MarkTermsOfThisTypeAlsoUnavailable

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
GetThesaurusTypes, GetTaxonomyTermTypes join(DimID == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermTypeID),
	isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(insert, delete, update)

transformations.name: ConvertDimToType
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@insert derive(DimAvailable = true(),
		DimSourceID = 2,
		DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertDimToType

transformations.name: SelectColumnsToInsert
transformations.script:
ConvertDimToType select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID = DimID,
		TypeName = DimTypeName,
		TypeDescription = DimTypeDescription,
		TypeAvailable = DimAvailable,
		DimSourceID
	))~> SelectColumnsToInsert

transformations.name: ConvertNameAndDesc
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@update derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc

transformations.name: SelectForUpdate
transformations.script:
ConditionForUpdate select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName = DimTypeName,
		TypeDescription = DimTypeDescription
	))~> SelectForUpdate

transformations.name: TermTypeSoftDelete
transformations.script:
SelectValueToModify select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		TypeAvailable,
		TypeSourceID,
		Description = TypeDescription
	))~> TermTypeSoftDelete

transformations.name: SoftDeleteTermTable
transformations.script:
SelectValueToModify select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		TypeDescription,
		TypeAvailable
	))~> SoftDeleteTermTable
